actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

official_title: To ensure that a former Federal building in Shreveport, Louisiana, is no longer known as the "Joe Waggoner Federal Building".

summary.text: Prohibits the former Federal Building located at 500 Fannin Street in Shreveport, Louisiana, from being known as the "Joe Waggoner Federal Building."

titles.title: To ensure that a former Federal building in Shreveport, Louisiana, is no longer known as the "Joe Waggoner Federal Building".
